This contributes to the following Country Programme result: At least 80 per cent of pregnant women, new-borns and children less than five years of age and adolescents have access to high- impact quality maternal, new-born, child and adolescent health interventions including HIV and AIDS with a special focus on the most disadvantaged districts and communities.
